definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (cf. Ar. waja castravit, wajiya be abraded (of the foot); of horse, have pain in the hoof)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[נוּגוֹת]] (on form v. Kö:i. 582) La 1:4 (‖[[נֶאֱנׇחִים]], [[מַר]]) grieved, mpl. cstr. [[נוּגֵי]] (v. Kö:l.c.) Zep 3:18 (sq. prep., cf. Ges:§ 130. 1); of virgins of Zion La 1:4; of exiles Zep 3:18.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוֹגה]] La 1:12, La 3:32; sf. [[הוֹגׇהּ]] La 1:5; Impf. 2 mpl. [[תּוֹגְיוּן]] Job 19:2; Pt. pl. sf. [[מוֹגַיִךְ]] Is 51:23; —cause grief or sorrow, abs. La 3:32 (opp. [[רִחַם]]); sq. acc. (Zion) La 1:5, cf. Is 51:23, also La 1:12 (obj. om., but [[אשׁר]] of grief = wherewith); sq. [[נׇפְשִׁי]] Job 19:2.—On 2Sa 20:13 v. II. [[יגה]].
